description: How Russia aims to achieve its goal of keeping Ukraine isolated from the West.
title: Russia’s Endgame in Ukraine
title_page: Russia’s Endgame in Ukraine - The New York Times
maintext:
While Donetsk and Luhansk will almost certainly gain some autonomy, Ukraine would like to minimize their influence and deny any veto over geopolitical alliances.
For Russia, a victory would have the eastern regions become autonomous but retain seats in Ukraine’s Parliament, possibly allowing them to derail Ukraine’s aspirations for NATO or European Union membership.
